title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the Spaghetti until al dente.
Combine pasta, bacon and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chucks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth, buttery, and creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Add chicken to sauce and simmer.
